scripts.build:react: cd react && npm install && babel src --presets babel-preset-env --out-dir dist && cd ..
scripts.build:react-native: cd react-native && npm install && babel src --presets babel-preset-env --out-dir dist && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:react && npm run build:react-native
scripts.publish:full: npm run build:all && npm version patch && npm publish
